text: My Ruin is a metal band from Los Angeles. The members are Tairrie B and her husband Mick Murphy. ==History== My Ruin was started by Tairrie B in February 1999. Speak And Destroy was released on 23rd August 1999. Kerrang! gave the album a good review. In 2000 the band's second album A Prayer Under Pressure of Violent Anguish was released. The band's third album was released on 23 October 2003. ==References== Category:1999 establishments in California Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Nu metal bands
title: My Ruin
